title: A January Dandelion - "And yet...thy slender stem"

content.question: In lines 8-10 (“And yet . . . stem”), the speaker primarily does which of the following?

choices.label: Offers a lament for the dandelion’s lonely status.
Curses the dandelion for its untimely and gaudy display of color.
Introduces a comparison between the dandelion’s fate and human experience.
Suggests that humankind should look to the dandelion for inspiration and comfort.

content.answer: Introduces a comparison between the dandelion’s fate and human experience.

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Identify and explain the function of a metaphor.
